summary: In a Scandinavian insane asylum, murderer Salem sneaks-out at night to exact his revenge on those who he deems responsible for his predicament.
cast: Max von Sydow|Trevor Howard|Liv Ullmann|Per Oscarsson|Rupert Davies|Andrew Keir|Jim Kennedy|Arthur Hewlett|Hanne Borchsenius|Gretchen Franklin|Bjørn Watt-Boolsen|Lotte Freddie|Erik Kühnau
title: El visitante nocturno
